attributes.action: Take action to bring about the banning of seal culling by Canada
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the killing of seals by clubbing or any other method for pelts is barbaric. We are living in a world where synthetic fur has equal and in some cases better properties than animal pelts. The Cull is is unnecessary and cruel. We should be protecting our wildlife from those who seek to benefit from the suffering caused by the cull

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/SealHunting/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
